ui.title: TFGBV Global Resources
ui.subtitle: Educational resources kag international guides parte sa online safety kag Technology-Facilitated Gender-Based Violence (TFGBV).
ui.local_support_title: Kinahanglan mo bala sang immediate support sa Pilipinas?
ui.local_support_desc: Nag-compile kami sang specialized local resources para sa survivors sang online harassment kag gender-based violence.

chayn.name: CHAYN’s DIY Online Safety Guide
chayn.description: Isa ka comprehensive, survivor-led guide para magpabilin nga safe online, naga-cover sang topics halin sa pag-secure sang accounts hasta sa pag-atubang sa harassment.

australia_esafety.name: Australia’s E-Safety Guide
australia_esafety.description: Isa ka world-leading resource nga nagatalakay sang key topics sa online safety, dala ang deepfakes, cyberbullying, kag image-based abuse.

unfpa.name: UNFPA: TFGBV Considerations
unfpa.description: Isa ka critical resource nga may titulo nga: "Technology-facilitated gender-based violence: Considerations across the life course", nga naga-explore sang impact sang digital harm.

fma.name: Foundation for Media Alternatives (FMA)
fma.description: Isa ka Philippine-based NGO nga naka-focus sa intersection sang technology kag human rights. May specific resources sila parte sa gender-based violence kag dedicated helpline.

cnxus.name: She Leads Curriculum on TFGBV
cnxus.description: Isa ka specialized educational curriculum nga gindesinyo para i-empower ang leaders kag advocates nga solbaron ang technology-facilitated gender-based violence.

svri.name: SVRI Global Library
svri.description: Isa ka malapad nga repository sang research kag resources nga dedicated sa intersection sang technology kag gender-based violence.
